H0.text: Which X Factor winner is currently playing Aiden Conner in Coronation Street. Steve Brookstein

H1.text: Which X Factor winner is currently playing Aiden Conner in Coronation Street. Leon Jackson

H3.text: Which X Factor winner is currently playing Aiden Conner in Coronation Street. Shane Ward

A4.text: On 12 May 2015, ITV announced they had signed Ward to a one-year contract deal to appear on Coronation Street as Aidan Connor
